channel.title: Typescript on 个人博客
channel.description: Recent content in Typescript on 个人博客

item.title: TS常用用法
item.description: arr 转map const arr = [ {metricsKey: 'k-1', metricsValue: 'v-1'}, {metricsKey: 'k-2', metricsValue: 'v-2'}, {metricsKey: 'k-3', metricsValue: 'v-3'}, {metricsKey: 'k-4', metricsValue: 'v-4'}, {metricsKey: 'k-5', metricsValue: 'v-5'}, ] const map = new Map<string, string>(); arr.forEach(({metricsKey, metricsValue}) => map.set(metricsKey, metricsValue))
